author: doogie
msg: Add support for UPPER and LOWER functions in index fields.

author: doogie
msg: There is no reason to convert the controller xml url to a file first.

author: doogie
msg: When use-iterator=true, then no caching is possible.  So, if caching was
requested during an inventory lookup, then turn off the use of the
iterator, so that the cache can actually be used.  This is a speedup.

author: doogie
msg: If promotion processing is turned off, then don't attempt to see of the
requested productPromoCodeId is valid and usable.  This is to support
loading of promo codes from the database during loadCartFromOrder.

author: mturk
msg: Trivial: Use ptrdiff_t for address math directly instead needlessly cast to uint64
